distinct
from PDSCI.IRB_REGULATION
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.IRB_REGULATION (REG_FLOW, REG_NAME, FILE_FLOW, REG_TYPE_ID, REG_TYPE_NAME, ORDINAL, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW) values (#{regFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordinal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
